Name: Marian Hegemony
Description: The Hegemony was founded in 2920 by a LosTech hunter in the planet of Alphard, Johann Sebastian O'Reilly who found a germanium cache left behind by the Alphard Trading Company. Modelled after the ancient Roman empire, the Republic resorted to a bandit kingdom for most of its life in order to survive, conducting raids in nearby worlds.
ReputationStatements: Imperator O'Reilly requires the services of mercenary auxilia to supplement the Marian Legions.
